Module courseplanner
Package courseplanner

Class PlannerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • courseplanner.PlannerManager
  • public class PlannerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The PlannerManager class runs a menu driven application which first creates an empty Planner object. The program prompts the user for a command to execute an operation. Once a command has been chosen, the program may ask the user for additional information if necessary, and performs the operation.
    Author:
    Sayan Sivakumaran e-mail: sayan.sivakumaran@stonybrook.edu Stony Brook ID: 110261379

      static void revertToBackup()
      Changes the reference of the main planner to the backup planner.

        Delegates which function to run depending on the command entered..
        Postconditions
        The command has called the appropriate function.

      • addCourse

        public static void addCourse()
        Constructs the course object specified by the parameters and adds it to the planner.
        Postconditions
        The course with the given field values is now in the planner, and the user returns to the menu.

      • getCourse

        public static void getCourse()
        Retrieves the course from the specified position, and prints it to the user.
        Postconditions
        The desired course has been printed, and the user returns to the menu.

      • removeCourse

        public static void removeCourse()
        Removes the course from the specified position, and prints out a confirmation message.
        Postconditions
        The desired course has been printed, and the user returns to the menu.

      • printAllCourses

        public static void printAllCourses()
        Prints all the courses in the planner.
        Postconditions
        The planner has been printed, and the user returns to the menu.

      • filterCourses

        public static void filterCourses()
        Filters the courses based on a given department code, and prints the results to the user.
        Postconditions
        The filtered courses have been printed, and the user returns to the menu.

      • lookForCourse

        public static void lookForCourse()
        Looks for a course with the given fields in the planner.
        Postconditions
        The program attempts to find the course, and prints the appropriate message. The user then returns to the menu.

      • size

        public static void size()
        Prints the number of courses in the planner to the user.
        Postconditions
        The number of courses has been printed, and the user returns to the menu.

      • backup

        public static void backup()
        Saves a deep copy of the planner to backupPlanner.
        Postconditions
        The backupPlanner is a deep copy of the planner.

      • printBackup

        public static void printBackup()
        Prints all the courses in the backup planner.
        Postconditions
        The backup planner has been printed, and the user returns to the menu.

      • revertToBackup

        public static void revertToBackup()
        Changes the reference of the main planner to the backup planner.
        Postconditions
        The main planner has reverted to the backup.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Starts the program, and sends the user to the main menu.
